comments:
Using Eclipse 3.2.1 GA with CDT 3.1.1

Open the c++ perspective and the error logs view.
Close the outline view and immediately an exception is thrown:-

From looking at URLImageDescriptor, there could be a number of causes for this exception, such as IOException while reading the image stream, or error creating the SWT image data.  It looks like better error reporting/logging is needed in URLImageDescriptor to find out the source of this problem.

I got the same error.

> From looking at URLImageDescriptor, there could be a number of causes for
> this exception, such as IOException while reading the image stream, or error
> creating the SWT image data.  It looks like better error reporting/logging
> is needed in URLImageDescriptor to find out the source of this problem.

How about the most obvious solution: a missing image?

target_filter.gif is not part of my eclipse installation.
I extracted cdt-4.0.0-M6-linux.x86.tar.gz and eclipse-SDK-3.3M6-linux-gtk.tar.gz.
Closing as WONTFIX.  The problem was found pretty quickly given the error message, and more subtle errors (SWT errors, etc.) are specifically thrown when the image data is retrieved.
